coreAttributes.name: Bread Roll
coreAttributes.description: A perfectly average bread roll, wrapped in a small, brown paper bag. A logo printed on one side of this wrapper shows a portly human chef giving you a thumbs-up while surrounded by all manner of delicious-looking baked goods.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel a lot healthier...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 2)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] the bread roll out of its protective paper bag and quickly [npc.verb(devour)] it, leaving [npc.herHim] with the delicious taste of freshly baked bread filling [npc.her] mouth.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] the bread roll out of its protective paper bag, before bringing it up to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.lips] and getting [npc2.herHim] to eat it. Quickly devouring it, [npc2.name] is left with the delicious taste of freshly baked bread filling [npc2.her] mouth.
